summary: Disbanded Texas Rangers are gathered together to help the U.S. Cavalry put an end to marauding outlaws.
cast: Roy Rogers|Lynne Roberts|Raymond Hatton|J. Farrell MacDonald|Purnell Pratt|Harry Woods|Bruce MacFarlane|Lane Chandler|Chester Gunnels|Lee Powell|John Beach|Bob Card|Horace B. Carpenter|Burr Caruth|Allan Cavan|Ben Corbett|Bert Dillard|Al Ferguson|Henry Hall|Chick Hannan|Al Haskell|Reed Howes|Philip Kieffer|Jack Kirk|Frank LaRue|Frank McCarroll|George Montgomery|Broderick O'Farrell|Rose Plumer|Al Taylor|Trigger|Robert J. Wilke
title: Come on, Rangers!
